tool_description: Gain access to publicly available data on both costco.com and costco.ca. Extract URLs from these websites, including Product Details URLs, Search Results URLs, and Category Pages URLs.
name: Costco
title: Costco

api_list.name: Get Product By URL
Extract URL (Search Results, Category Page, Product Details Page)

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Possible URL Types:

- Search Results URL
- Category Page URL
- Product Details URL

From the following sources only:

- Costco USA (costco.com)
- Costco Canada (costco.ca)

api_list.name: Search By Keyword
api_list.description: Get Search Results from keyword and filters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options:

- lowToHigh
- highToLow
- bestMatch
- highestRating
- mostRecent
- mostViewed

api_list.name: Get Product by SKU
Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get search results from a URL
This endpoint is for when you need highly custom filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results Page URL
This endpoint is for when you need highly custom filters.
